Talk_2000: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>There are Zonai devices inside this thing?
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>I think... Yes! I actually think this
might possibly be a truly amazing
discovery. Probably.
And contraptions like this one have shown
up in places other than just Tarrey Town.
<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>in Necluda, south of here,
has one.
<sp:0:4:0>And there's one in the southwest too—at
<clr:0000>Digdogg Bridge <clr:ffff>near the entrance to the
Gerudo region!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Could it be that...the types of Zonai devices inside
each area's contraption are different?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Questions require answers! We've got to
investigate the other contraptions!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But before that, I feel the need to
ceremonially award you for your
big discovery.
Talk_1000: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Ah! Are you interested in this too?
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I found it while investigating some
fallen ruins.

It's rare and was never seen before the
Upheaval, so its properties are something
of a mystery.
But there's a research team studying
the plant in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>—that's to
the south of here in Necluda.
If you want to learn more about it, you
might try talking to them.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Anyway, I'm off to more big adventures
and discoveries. Hope to see you again!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Look at this. It seems like there might
be...things...inside it. I wonder if we can
get them out.
This thing <clr:0000>fell from the sky <clr:ffff>at the time of
the Upheaval...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>But what is it? And where did it fall from?
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder... Can we remove the things
inside it?

What is this? Why is it here?
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>It was rankling to see that thing and not
be able to get the stuff inside. Thanks for
figuring it out.
Even so...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Sorry, can you wait a moment? I'm getting
drenched out here...
Talk_2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to give you a <clr:0000>sundelion<clr:ffff> to thank
you for your big discovery. Can you make
some room for it?
I'm not going to let you go without some
kind of reward!
Talk_2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if it will break if it gets wet in
the rain. I hope not. It's not as though
it's totally underwater.
Talk_2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's no need to worry about lightning
strikes, so maybe I'll get just a little
bit closer...
Talk_2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Oh... It appears you have too many
thingies and knick-knacks, and no room
for this <clr:0000>sundelion <clr:ffff>I meant to give you.
Why don't you make some space and
come back? I wouldn't want to send you
away empty-handed.
Talk_2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>You made space in your pouch! Excellent!
Here's this, then!
